Environmental Services

email address herephone number heresms phone number herefax number hereminicom number here

Slipways are available to the public for launch and recovery of trailed boats.

A fee is payable at the time of launching which includes the parking of trailers (subject to space being available) but not cars. Seasonal permits for launch and recovery are available. Launch and recovery may be restricted during low water periods on spring tides.

Typical charges are as follows:

Daily Rate

Length Overall Charge (inc vat)
Up to 4 metres enter amount
Over 4 metres up to 5.5 metres enter amount
Over 5.5 metres up to 7 metres enter amount
Over 7 metres (per metre per day) enter amount

Seasonal Permits

Length Overall Charge (inc vat)
Up to 4 metres enter amount
Over 4 metres up to 5.5 metres enter amount
Over 5.5 metres up to 7 metres enter amount
Over 7 metres (per metre) enter amount
